author: Rohan Agarwal
title: Better Security using Shamir Shares
description: Securing ADA should not have loss and theft risks. However all of the Hardware wallets have single point of failure today with PK storage.

assessments.note: This proposal is not for the development of a dApp or the integration of one at all, instead for an ADA HW wallet support. Cardano already has multiple HW and paper wallet support options for users. This is a proposal asking 100k to include ADA in their already developed but not deployed product.
This is not a dapp or dapp int and Cardano has several HW wallet options (beyond trezor) on market today.
There is no project roadmap, metrics included or links to verify most of the lofty claims made against Trezor and other HW wallet solutions.
This proposal is lacking basic details and is also not a dapp at all.
This proposal does not belong in the dApp challenge at all. It's also lacking most of the basic details expected in a mature proposal in any of the challenges.
Nothing about this proposal in a dapp challenge makes sense to me.

solution: Integration with Cypherock X1 that uses Shamir Secret Sharing to store keys without a single point of failure on tamper proof smartcards.
experience: Product already has support for BTC, ETH, ERC20 tokens. It is currently in private beta with 400+ on the waitlist.
